name: Retro League
description:
Retro League ///

This is a rough clone of Rocket League made if it was in the late 1980s.

It was made for the PTBOGameJam 03 from 04-August-2017 to 06-August-2017.

It features:-

  • Impressive state of the art 3D Graphics
  • One, Two-Player, Co-op and Multiplayer
  • Car and Ball physics
  • Up to Four other Cars
  • Multiplayer support through PC Networks (EXPERIMENTAL AND MAY NOT WORK)

Gameplay Video | Source Code

Please refer to the manual below system requirements, controller information, and gameplay tips!
